topics.body:
my parents have allowed me to drink since i was a teenager
they know i am responsible enough
i just chose to never drink

on my 19th birthday how ever my older brother and sister wanted to take me drinking to celebrate
i reluctantly agreed
that night i had a beer, 3 long island ice teas, a double long island ice tea, a martini, and a shot
i ended up feeling a lack of balance and that i was gonna fall over
half hour through the car ride home i felt normal again

so my personal drinking experience is
meh
